author: Chris Tierney
message:
feat: implement Material-based Frame spec with validation

Transform Frame from flat structure to Material-based tree for style inheritance.

Spec changes:
- Add RootMaterial (complete) and ChildMaterial (partial with ref) types
- Add validateFrame() for single-pass tree validation
- Add resolveMaterial() for style inheritance resolution
- Frame now uses root: RootMaterial instead of shapes: Shape[]

Generator changes:
- ProceduralGenerator emits Material tree, adds fill/stroke/strokeWidth methods
- ObjectGenerator (Scene) emits Material tree, adds fill/stroke/strokeWidth props

Renderer changes:
- Both renderers call validateFrame() before rendering
- Traverse Material tree with renderNode(), resolve styles per shape
- Shapes now rendered with material fill/stroke/strokeWidth

Safety:
- resolveMaterial() guards against empty ancestors array
- validateFrame() checks root has all required properties

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Chris Tierney
message:
feat: major architecture improvements across generators and renderers

Test App:
- Refactor to 2 generators + 4 harnesses with code display
- Remove old apps/ directory, add generators/ and harnesses/
- Show generator code and harness code separately

Renderers:
- Add @medli/renderer-common with BaseRenderer abstract class
- SVG and Canvas renderers extend BaseRenderer (shared loop/stop)
- Default to white background when backgroundColor undefined

Object Generator:
- Remove ObjectGenerator class - Scene IS the generator
- Scene implements Generator, pass directly to renderers
- Add SceneObject interface for extensible scene tree
- Background is optional via setBackground()/add()/remove()

Procedural Generator:
- Redesign with p5.js-style sketch pattern
- Pass draw function: new ProceduralGenerator((p) => p.background(color))
- Sketch context provides background() and time

Spec:
- Frame.backgroundColor is now optional
